extension.description:
This add-on contains basic dsp related parts to handle speaker delays, channel related volume amplification.
As mode it support a Dolby Pro Logic II compatible multichannel downmix to stereo, which becomes available if only 2 channel output on Kodi is selected.
extension.disclaimer: This addon is still in development to increase amount of features, e.g. speaker position changes.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007

extension.summary: Includes an equalizer post processing mode
extension.description: The first version of this add-on includes a parametric equalizer post processing mode with constant-Q peaking filters (biquad filter). It allows you to boost or cut 10 frequency bands.
extension.disclaimer: Note: it's the first version. Consequently please use a low audio volume at first, which can protect your ears.

extension.description: FreeSurround is meant to be the KODI equivalent of your hi-fi receiver's Dolby ProLogic II button. It's purpose is to decode surround information from your stereo music and to produce multichannel output from it.
extension.disclaimer: This is a open source audio dsp processing system, based upon work from pro_optimizer on foobar2000
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007

extension.description:
Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!
Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!
Created by Gabriele Cirulli. Based on 1024 by Veewo Studio and conceptually similar to Threes by Asher Vollmer.

Port of 4DO/libfreedo to libretro.
Supported files: .iso

Beetle bSNES is the SNES module of Beetle, a fork of Mednafen. Mednafen's SNES module itself is a fork of bSNES v0.59.
Supported files: .smc, .fig, .bs, .st, .sfc

Beetle GBA is a fork of Mednafen's GBA core for the libretro project.
Supported files: .gba, .agb, .bin

Beetle Lynx is the Atari Lynx module of Beetle, a fork of Mednafen. The Mednafen module is a fork of Handy.
Supported files: .lnx

Based on NeoPop, this emulator is not very accurate in terms of low-level details. However, it is sufficient to play most commercially released games fairly well.
Supported files: .ngp, .ngc

Beetle PCE Fast, a PC Engine emulator for Libretro, is a fork of Mednafen's PC Engine driver.
Supported files: .pce, .cue, .ccd

Beetle PSX is the PlayStation module of Beetle, a port of Madnafen
Supported files: .exe, .cue, .toc, .ccd, .m3u, .pbp

Source: https://github.com/libretro/beetle-supergrafx-libretro
Supported files: .pce, .sgx, .cue, .ccd

Source: https://github.com/libretro/beetle-vb-libretro
Supported files: .vb, .vboy, .bin

Source: https://github.com/libretro/beetle-wswan-libretro
Supported files: .ws, .wsc

BlueMSX is a rich MSX emulator. It supports most common machines and a wide variety of extension hardware.
Supported extensions: .rom, .ri, .mx1, .mx2, .col, .sg, .sc
Authors: Daniel Vik, Benoit Delvaux, Tomas Karlsson, Johan van Leur, Ricardo Bittencourt and Ray Zero
Supported files: .rom, .ri, .mx1, .mx2, .dsk, .col, .sg, .sc, .cas

libretro port of bNES, a NES emulator.
Supported files: .nes
Authors: byuu, Ryphecha.

bSNES Mercury is a fork of Higan (originally called bSNES), notable for emulating the original hardware as accurately as possible through low-level, cycle-accurate emulation.
The "Accuracy" profile focuses on accuracy at the cost of performance.
Supported files: .sfc, .smc, .bml
http://byuu.org/

bSNES Mercury is a fork of Higan (originally called bSNES), notable for emulating the original hardware as accurately as possible through low-level, cycle-accurate emulation.
The "Balanced" profile is a good compromise between accuracy and performance.
Supported files: .sfc, .smc, .bml
http://byuu.org/

bSNES Mercury is a fork of Higan (originally called bSNES), notable for emulating the original hardware as accurately as possible through low-level, cycle-accurate emulation.
The "Performance" profile focusses more on execution speed than on accuracy.
Supported files: .sfc, .smc, .bml
http://byuu.org/
Supported files: .dsk, .sna, .zip, .tap, .cdt, .voc
A simple Minecraft clone written in C using modern OpenGL (shaders).

Source: https://github.com/libretro/Dinothawr
Supported files: .game

Final Burn Alpha is an emulator of arcade games. Currently, FB Alpha supports games on Capcom CPS-1 and CPS-2 hardware, SNK Neo-Geo hardware, Toaplan hardware, Cave hardware, Sega System 16, and various games on miscellaneous hardware. FB Alpha is based on the original FinalBurn.
Supported files: .iso, .zip, .7z
Icon credit: TRIPLEKILLZ (triplekillz.deviantart.com)
extension.disclaimer: The authors of FB Alpha don't guarantee its fitness for any purpose, implied or otherwise, and do not accept responsibility for any damages whatsoever that might occur when using FB Alpha. All games emulated by FB Alpha, including any images and sounds therein, are copyrighted by their respective copyright holders.

extension.description:
Port of FCEUmm to Libretro. FCEUmm emulates NES, Famicom, and Famicom Disk System (FDS). FCEUmm merges elements from FCEU Ultra, FCEU rerecording, FCEUXD, FCEUXDSP, FCEUXDSP CE, and FCEU-mm into a single branch of FCEU.
Supported files: .fds, .nes, .unf, .unif
Icon credit: Anarkhya (anarkhya.deviantart.com)

Source: https://github.com/libretro/fmsx-libretro
Supported files: .rom, .mx1, .mx2

Source: https://github.com/libretro/fuse-libretro
Supported files: .tzx, .tap, .z80, .rzx, .scl, .trd

extension.summary: Game Boy / Game Boy Color (Gambatte) v0.5.0-netlink
extension.description:
Gambatte is an accuracy-focused, open-source, cross-platform Game Boy Color emulator written in C++.
Supported files: .gb, .gbc, .dmg
extension.disclaimer: Game Boy and Game Boy Color are registered trademarks of Nintendo of America, Inc. Gambatte is not affiliated with or endorsed by any of the companies mentioned.

extension.description:
An enhanced port of Genesis Plus to the libretro API. Support for SG-1000, Mark-III, Master System, Game Gear, Mega Drive & Mega CD hardware.
Special thanks to: twinaphex for backporting enhancements from the GX version (Gamecube/Wii port).
Supported files: .mdx, .md, .smd, .gen, .bin, .cue, .iso, .sms, .gg, .sg

Source: https://github.com/libretro/gw-libretro
Supported files: .mgw

Handy is an Atari Lynx emulator by K. Wilkins for Windows 95/98/NT/2000/XP.
Supported files: .lnx

Source: https://github.com/libretro/hatari
Supported files: .ST, .MSA, .ZIP, .STX, .DIM, .IPF

MAME2003 stands for [B]M[/B]ultiple [B]A[/B]rcade [B]M[/B]achine [B]E[/B]mulator. MAME2003 can currently emulate several thousand different classic arcade video games from the late 1970s through the modern era.
Supported files: .zip, .chd, .7z
Icon credit: peter-86 (peter-86.deviantart.com)
License: GPLv2

Meteor is a Nintendo Gameboy Advance emulator.
Supported files: .gba
Authors: Philippe Daouadi <p.daouadi@free.fr>, Hans-Kristian Arntzen (libretro port and fixes) <maister@archlinux.us>

mGBA aims to be faster and more accurate than many existing Game Boy Advance emulators, as well as adding features that other emulators lack.
Supported files: .gba, .gb, .gbc

Mupen64 is a N64 emulator desgined to be multi-OS. It uses a plugin system and is highly compatible.
Supported files: .n64, .v64, .z64, .bin, .u1, .ndd

Nestopia is a portable open source NES/Famicom emulator. It is designed to be as accurate as possible and supports a large number of peripherals. The hardware is emulated at cycle-by-cycle granularity, ensuring full support for software that does mid-scanline and other timing trickery.
Supported files: .nes, .fds, .unf, .unif
Icon credit: Anarkhya (anarkhya.deviantart.com)

NXEngine is a complete open-source clone/rewrite of the masterpiece jump-and-run platformer Doukutsu Monogatari (also known as Cave Story).
Supported files: .exe

Source: https://github.com/libretro/libretro-o2em
Supported files: .bin

extension.platforms: Genesis|Game Gear|SEGA Master System|Sega CD|Megadrive|Mega CD

extension.description:
Picodrive is yet another Megadrive / Genesis / Sega CD / Mega CD / 32X / SMS emulator heavily optimized for ARM.
Authors: Dave (aka fdave, finalburn author) and notaz
Supported files: .bin, .gen, .smd, .md, .32x, .cue, .iso, .sms

PrBoom is a version of the classic 3D shoot'em'up game Doom, originally written by id Software.
To play PrBoom, you need one of the main Doom data files (called the IWAD) from id Software - doom.wad, doom2.wad, tnt.wad or plutonia.wad - or the shareware doom1.wad.
If you don't own any of the Doom games, get the shareware doom1.wad from doom19s.zip on Doomworld's shareware download page. http://www.doomworld.com/files/shareware.shtml
Additionally it needs the prboom.wad from https://github.com/libretro/libretro-prboom/raw/master/prboom.wad copied to the game directory.
Supported files: .wad, .iwad
Supported files: .a78, .bin

The QuickNES core library, originally by Shay Green, heavily modified. QuickNES is a newer emulator that seems to have good compatibility.
Supported files: .nes

ScummVM is a collection of game engine recreations. ScummVM emulates several systems, including the SCUMM system for LucasArts adventure games.
Supported files: .exe, .scum, .scummvm

Snes9x is a portable, freeware SNES and Super Famicom emulator. Snes9x is coded in C++, with three assembler CPU emulation cores on the i386 Linux and Windows ports.
Supported files: .smc, .sfc, .swc, .fig
Icon credit: HarryBana (harrybana.deviantart.com)
extension.disclaimer: The Snes9X team is not connected or affiliated with any mentioned company in any way. The opinions of the Snes9X team do not reflect the views of the various companies mentioned here. Companies and all products pertaining to that company are trademarks of that company. Please contact that company for trademark and copyright information.

extension.description:
Port of SNES9x 1.39 for libretro (was previously called PocketSNES). Heavily optimized for ARM.
Supported files: smc, fig, sfc, gd3, gd7, dx2, bsx, swc, zip

Port of Snes9x 1.52+ to Libretro (previously called SNES9x Next). Rewritten in C and several optimizations and speedhacks.
Supported files: .smc, .fig, .sfc, .gd3, .gd7, .dx2, .bsx, .swc
Icon credit: HarryBana (harrybana.deviantart.com)

Stella is a multi-platform Atari 2600 VCS emulator. The Atari 2600 Video Computer System (VCS), introduced in 1977, was the most popular home video game system of the early 1980's.
Supported files: .a26, .bin
Stella was originally developed for Linux by Bradford W. Mott, and is currently maintained by Stephen Anthony.

VBA-Next is a fork from the now inactive VisualBoy Advance project, with goals to improve the compatibility and features of the emulator.

Baie dankie hiervoor!

Filmon . Live TV, , EPG . Filmon . : (a) in Filmon set channels as favourite to see them in Kodi (b) addon's , . : .

Bahagian hadapan Filmon. Menyokong TV langsung, rakaman, EPG. Memerlukan langganan Filmon. Sebelum dibenarkan: (a) dalam Filmon tetapkan saluran sebagai kegemaran untuk menontonnya di dalam Kodi (b) masukkan nama pengguna dan kata laluan di dalam tetapan tambahan ini. Perhatian: rakaman mengambil masa beberapa minit untuk muncul selepas pemasa selesai.

Il-Filmon frontend isservi biex thaddem Telvixin live, irrekordjar, EPG. Trid tkun miktub ma Filmon. Qabel thaddem: (a) f'Filmon ghazel xi stazzjonijiet bhala l-favoriti tieghek halli tkun tista' tarahom f'Kodi (b) dahhal il- username u l- kodici fis-settings ta din l-applikazzjoni. N.B. Recordings jistghu jiehdu numru ta' minuti sakemm jigu jidhru wara li l-arlogg ilesti.

Filmon klient. Sttter live TV, opptak, EPG. Krever abonnement hos Filmon. Fr aktivering: (a) sett kanaler som favoritter p Filmon for se de i Kodi. (b) skriv inn brukernavn og passord innstillingene til denne utvidelsen. Merk at det kan ta flere minutter fr et opptak vises i listen etter at nedtellingen er ferdig.

Filmon frontend. Ondersteunt live TV, Opnamen, EPG. Vereist een Filmon inschrijving. Voordat je inschakelt: (a) in Filmon stel kanalen in als favoriet om ze te zien in Kodi (b) voer je gebruikersnaam en wachtwoord in in de add-on instellingen. PS: opnamen kunnen meerdere minuten duren voordat ze worden getoond nadat de timer is gecomplementeerd.

Klient telewizji dla FilmOn obsuguje transmisj kanaw telewizyjnych, nagrywanie oraz funkcje przewodnika telewizyjnego. Wymaga patnej subskrypcji usug FilmOn. Przed uyciem naley: (a) ustawi kanay jako ulubione (b) wprowadzi nazw uytkownika i haso w ustawieniach klienta. Uwaga: Nagrania mog si pojawi dopiero po kilku minutach po zakoczeniu nagrywania.

PVR Filmon. Suporte TV ao Vivo, gravaes, EPG. Requer uma subscrio Filmon. Antes de ativar: (a) em Filmon defina os canais favoritos para v-los no Kodi (b) Entre seu nome de usurio e senha nos ajustes do addon. Nota: Gravaes pode levar algum tempo para ficar disponvel aps o mesmo ter sido completado.

Interface Filmon. Suporta TV em direto, gravaes e EPG. Requer uma subscrio Filmon. Antes de ativar: (a) no Filmon, defina os canais como favoritos para os ver no Kodi (b), digite o seu nome de utilizador e a palavra-passe nas definies do add-on. Nota: as gravaes podem levar alguns minutos a aparecer aps o temporizador ter concludo.

Partea din fa pentru Filmon. Suport televiziune n direct, nregistrri, EPG. Necesit un abonament Filmon. nainte de activare: (a) n Filmon stabilii canale ca favorite pentru a le vedea n Kodi (b) introducei-v numele de utilizator i parola n configurrile suplimentului. Atenie: poate s dureze cteva minute ca nregistrrile s apar dup ce cronometrul s-a terminat.
FilmOn. , , EPG. FilmOn. : (a) FilmOn, Kodi (b), . : .

Filmon priamy prstup. Podpouje iv TV, nahrvania, EPG. Vyaduje Filmon predplatn. Pred tm ako umon (a) vo Filmone kanly ako obben vidie v Kodi (b) vlo svoje prstupov meno a heslo v nastaveniach tohto add on. Nahrvanie me trva niekoko mint po ukoneni asomiery.

Odjemalec Filmon. Podpira TV v ivo, posnetke, EPG. Potrebna je naronina na Filmon. Preden omogoite: (a) v Filmonu nastavite programe kot priljubljene, da se prikaejo v Kodiju (b) vnesite vae uporabniko ime in geslo v nastavitvah tega dodatka. Opomba: posnetki se lahko prikaejo ele po nekaj minutah, ko se snemanje zakljui.
. , , EPG. Filmon . : () Filmon- Kodi () . : .

Filmon interfejs. Podrava TV Uivo, snimke, EPG. Zahteva Filmon pretplatu. Pre omoguivanja: (a) u Filmonu podesite kanale kao omiljeno da bi ih videli u Kodi (b) unesite svoje korisniko ime i lozinku u podeavanjima ovog dodatnog programa. Napomena: snimcima je nekada potrebno nekoliko minuta da bi se pojavili nakon to se tajmer zavri.

Filmon frontend. Stder live-TV, inspelningar, EPG. Krver ett Filmon-abonnemang. Innan du aktiverar: (a) Stll in favoritkanaler i Filmon fr att kunna se dem i Kodi. (b) Ange ditt anvndarnamn och lsenord i instllningar fr detta tillgg. Observera: Det kan ta flera minuter innan inspelningar visas efter att timern r klar.

Frontend d Filmona. Podpiyr TV, nagrywaniy, EPG. Wymg abniyrowani Filmona. Przed wnczyniym: (a) we Filmonie przidej kanay do wertownych, coby je bezdrze we Kodi, (b) wklud swoje miano d uywcza i haso we sztelnkach tyj przidwki. Pozr: nagrania mogm sie pokzywa pr minut po skczyniu nagrywani.
Filmon . TV, , EPG . Filmon . : () Filmon () . : .

Filmon n ucu. Canl TV'leri, kaytlar, EPG'leri destekler. Bir Filmon abonelii gerektirir. Etkinletirmeden nce: (a) Kodi ierisinde grmek iin Filmon ierisinde kanallar favori olarak ayarlayn (b) bu eklentinin ayarlarnda kullanc ad ve parolanz girin. Not: Kaytlarn grnmesi iin zamanlayc tamamlandktan sonra birka dakika gerekebilir.

extension.description: MythTV voorprogram (tot MythTV 0.28). Ondersteun stroom van Lewendige TV & Opnames, luister na Radio kanale, EPG en Tydhouers.
MythTV frontend (up to MythTV 0.28). Supports streaming of Live TV & Recordings, listening to Radio channels, EPG and Timers.
MythTV ( MythTV 0.28). , , .

Frontal de MythTV (fins a MythTV 0.28). s compatible amb les transmissions en lnia de TV en directe i enregistraments, escolta d'emissores de rdio, guia electrnica de programaci (EPG) i temporitzadors.

Interface logicielle MythTV (jusqu' la version 0.28). Permet la diffusion de la TV en direct, des enregistrements, des stations de radios, ainsi que le guide lectronique des programmes TV et les programmations.
Interface de MythTV (maior da MythTV 0.28). Compatbel coa transmisin de TV ao vivo, gravacins e escoita de canles de Radio, EPG e temporizadores.
MythTV ( 0.28 MythTV). , , .
MythTV suelje (za inaice do MythTV 0.28. Podrava streamanje i snimanje TV programa, sluanje radio programa, elektronski programski vodi (EPG) i zakazana snimanja.
MythTV eltt (MythTv 0.28 verziig). l adsok, felvtelek s rdiadsok tmogatsa EPG-vel s idztssel.
Antarmuka MythTV (hingga MythTV 0.28). Mendukung streaming TV Langsung & Rekaman, mendengarkan channel Radio, EPG dan Penghitung waktu.
MythTV framendi (upp a MythTV 0.28). Styur streymingu fr beinum tsendingum og upptkum, hlustun tvarp, rafrna dagskrrvsa og tma upptkur.
Frontend MythTV (compatibile fino a MythTV 0.28). Supporta lo streaming TV in diretta, le registrazioni, l'ascolto dei canali radio, EPG e programmazioni.
MythTV ( 0.28 ) TV EPG
MythTV (up to MythTV 0.28). TV , , , EPG, .
MythTV ssaja (kelias iki MythTV 0.28). Palaiko duomen srautams pritaikyta(-as) Live TV & Recordings
MythTV galasistma (ldz MythTV 0.28). Atbalsta tieraides TV un ierakstu straumanu, radio kanlu klausanos, EPG un taimerus.
MythTV ( MythTV 0.28). Live TV & , , EPG .
Bahagian hadapan MythTV (sehingga MythTV 0.28). Menyokong penstirman TV Langsung & Rakaman, mendengar saluran Radio, EPG dan Pemasa.
MythTV-klienten (opp til MythTV 0.28). Sttter strmming av Live TV og opptak, avspilling av radiokanaler, EPG og nedtelling.
MythTV frontend (tot MythTV 0.28). Ondersteunt streaming van Live TV & opnames, luisteren naar radiokanalen, EPG en Timers.
Klient telewizji dla MythTV (wersja 0.28 i wczeniejsze) obsuguje transmisj kanaw radiowych i telewizyjnych, nagrywanie i harmonogram nagra oraz funkcje przewodnika telewizyjnego.
MythTV frontend (up para MythTV 0.28). Suporta streaming de TV ao Vivo & Gravaes, Escutar canais de rdios, EPG e Agendamentos.

Frontend MythTV (pn la MythTV 0.28). Suport difuzare n flux a televiziunii n direct i a nregistrriilor, ascultarea posturilor de radio, EPG i Cronometre.
MythTV ( MythTV 0.28). , -, .
MythTV rozhranie (a do verzie MythTV 0.28). Podporuje streamovanie ivho TV vysielania a nahrvok, povanie rozhlasovch kanlov, EPG a asovae.
Vmesnik za MythTV (do vkljuno MythTV 0.28). Podpira predvajanje televizije v ivo & posnetkov, posluanje radia, EPG in asovnike.
MythTV ( MythTV 0.28). & , , EPG .
MythTV interfejs (do MythTV 0.28). Podrava strimovanje TV Uivo & Snimaka, sluanje Radio kanala, EPG i Tajmere.
MythTV-frontend (upp till MythTV 0.28). Stdjer strmning av direktsnd TV & inspelningar, radiolyssning, EPG och timers.
Klijynt telewizyjny dl MythTV (wersyj 0.28 i wczaniyjsze) bsuguje szpricowanie kanaw radyjowych i telewizyjnych, nagrowanie i harmnogram nagra, a ty funkcyje kludzcza telewizyjnygo.
MythTV n ucu (MythTV 0.28'ye kadar). Canl TV ak ve kayt yapabilme, radyo kanallar dinleme, EPG ve zamanlayclar destekler.

extension.description: Hierdie is 'n PVR byvoegsel om met VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways te koppel. Dit ondersteun al die basiese funksionaliteit wat jy sal verwag, soos kyk, opneem en tydskuif. Addisioneel ondersteun dit die aanvul van die oor-die-lug gids data met eksterne XMLTV data.

Toto je PVR addon pro komunikaci s VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. Podporuje vechny zkladn funkce, kter byste oekvali, jako je sledovn, nahrvn a asov posun. Navc podporuje rozen vzduchem ench dat TV programu o extern XMLTV data.

Dette er et PVR addon, der kommunikerer med VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. Det understtter alle simple funktioner, s som at se, optage og tidsforskydelse. Derudover, understtter det over-the-air tv-guide data med eksternt XMLTV data.

Mit diesem Addon ist es mglich sich mit VBox Kommunikation XTiTv Zugngen zu verbinden. Es untersttzt dabei die Grundeinstellungen, wie anschauen, Aufnahme und Timeshift. Zustzlich wird das vergrern der Over the air Programmdaten mit externen XMLTV Daten untersttzt.
PVR VBox ' XTi TV Gateways . , , timeshifting . , over-the-air XMLTV .

This is a PVR addon for interfacing with VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. It supports all the basic functionality you would expect, such as watching, recording and timeshifting. Additionally, it supports augmenting the over-the-air guide data with external XMLTV data.

This is a PVR addon for interfacing with VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. It supports all the basic functionality you would expect, such as watching, recording and timeshifting. Additionally, it supports augmenting the over-the-air guide data with external XMLTV data.

This is a PVR addon for interfacing with VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. It supports all the basic functionality you would expect, such as watching, recording and timeshifting. Additionally, it supports augmenting the over-the-air guide data with external XMLTV data.

Este es un addon PVR que sirve como interfaz para Comunicaciones con puertas de enlace XTi TV. Soporta toda la funcionalidad bsica, por ejemplo, ver, grabar y timeshift. Adicionalmente, da da soporte adicional a la gua OTA con datos externos XMLTV.

Este es un complemento PVR para la interfaz con las pasarelas XTi TV de VBox Communications. Soporta todas las funciones bsicas que se esperan, como ver, grabar y cambiar de tiempo. Adems, soporta el aumento de los datos de gua de sobre el aire con datos XMLTV externos.

Tm PVR-lisosa on tarkoitettu kytettvksi VBox Communications XTi -laitteiden kanssa. Se tukee kaikkia perusominaisuuksia, kuten tv-lhetysten katsomista, tallentamista ja ajansiirtoa. Lisksi se tukee XMLTV-formaatissa olevia ohjelmatietoja.

Ceci est un addiciel de numriscope assurant l'interface avec les passerelles XTi TV de VBox Communications. Il prend en charge toutes les fonctions de base que vous pourriez attendre, telles que regarder, enregistrer, ainsi que le dcalage temporel. De plus, il prend en charge l'augmentation des donnes du guide tldiffus avec les donnes XMLTV.

Ceci est une extension enregistreur vido (PVR) s'interfaant avec les passerelles TV XTi de VBox Communications. L'extension permet les fonctionnalits attendues de base, comme le visionnage, l'enregistrement et le diffr. De plus, elle propose d'ajouter des donnes XMLTV externes du guide lectronique des programmes TV aux donnes diffuss.

Este engadido un PVR para interactuar con gateways de VBox Communications' XTi TV. Soporte todas as funcionalidades bsicas que poderas agardar, como ver, gravar e mudar o tempo. A maiores, tamn permite aumentar a gua en directo con datos externos XMLTV.
XTi TV Gateways VBox Communications. , . XMLTV .

Ovo je PVR dodatak za interakciju s VBox Communications' XTi TV pristupnicima. Podrava osnovne funkcije koje su vam potrebne, poput gledanja, snimanja i premotavanja. Dodatno, podrava proirenje EPG vodia s dodatnim XMLTV podacima.

Ez a PVR kiegszt sszekti a VBox Communications' XTi TV beltri egysggel. Tmogatja az alap funkcikat ami elvrhat, gymint ads, felvtel s cssztatott felvtel. Tmogatja mg az elektronikus msorjsgot, az ads eltt kiegsztve az XMLTV adatokkal.

Ini adalah addon PVR untuk berinteraksi dengan VBox Communications 'XTi TV Gateway. Mendukung semua fungsi dasar yang Anda harapkan, seperti menonton, merekam dan timeshifting. Selain itu, menambah dukungan panduan data melalui-the-air dengan data XMLTV eksternal.

etta er upptku-vibt til a tengjast VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. Hn styur allar grunnagerir sem gerir r fyrir, eins og a horfa , taka upp og tmaflakk. A auki styur a a bta vi dagskrrvsinn, sem kemur gegnum loftneti, upplsingum fr tvrum XMLTV ggnum.

Questo un Add-on PVR per interfacciarsi con i Gateway XTi TV di VBox Communications. Supporta tutte le funzionalit base che ti aspetti, come guardare, registrare e mettere in pausa. In pi, supporta l'integrazione dei dati della guida via radio con dati esterni XMLTV.
VBox Communications XTi TV PVR . , . Over-the-air XMLTV .

Tai yra PVR priedas, skirtas susieti su VBox Communications' XTi TV tinkl sietuvais. Jis palaiko visus pagrindinius funkcionalumus, kuri galite tiktis, tokius kaip irjimas, raymas ir laiko paslinkimas. Papildomai jis palaiko oru perduodamus gido duomenis su ioriniais XMLTV duomenimis.

is ir PVR pielikums saskarnei ar VBox Communications XTi TV vrtejm. Tas atbalsta visu pamata funkcionalitti, ko vartu sagaidt, piemram, skatanos, ierakstanu, laika nobdi. Piedevm tas atbalsta pa gaisu saemtu datu papildinanu ar rjiem XMLTV datiem.

Ia adalah tambahan PVR untuk pengantaramukaan dengan VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. Ia menyokong semua kefungsian asas yang anda jangkakan, seperti menonton, merakam dan anjak masa. Selain itu, ia menyokong augmentasi menerusi data panduan ke-udara dengan data XMLTV luaran.

Dette er en PVR utvidelse for grensesnitt med VBox Kommunikasjons'XTI TV Gateways. Den sttter all grunnleggende funksjonalitet du ville regnet med, som se p, opptak tidsforskyving. I tillegg, sttter den forsterkning av direktesendt guide informasjon med ekstern XMLTV informasjon.

Dit is een PVR addon voor verbinden met VBox communications` XTi TV Gateways. het ondersteunt alle basis functionaliteiten die je mag verwachten, zoals kijken, opnemen en tijd sprongen. Overig, het ondersteunt de over-the-air gids data met externe XML TV data,

Klient telewizji wsppracujcy z bramkami VBox Communications' XTi TV. Obsuguje transmisj kanaw telewizyjnych, nagrywanie oraz funkcje przewodnika telewizyjnego. Dodatkowo umoliwia rozszerzanie informacji przewodnika nadawanych razem z sygnaem telewizyjnych o informacje z zewntrznych rde XMLTV.

Este um addon de PVR para interface com Gateway do VBox Communications XtI TV. Suporta as funcionalidades bsicas que voc espera, como assistir, gravar e timeshifting. Adicionalmente, podes obter dados do guia Over-the-air ou dados externos via arquivo XMLTV.

O add-on de PVR um interface de comunicao da VBox s Gateways XTi TV. Suporta todas as funcionalidades bsicas esperadas pelo utilizador, tais como ver, gravar e ver mais tarde. Alm disso suporta o aumento do over-the-air de dados de programao externos com o XMLTV.

Acesta este un supliment PVR pentru conectarea cu receptoarele XTi ale celor de la VBox Communications. Suport toate funcionalitile de baz pe care le-ai atepta, cum este privirea, nregistrarea i decalajul temporal. Adiional, suport mbuntirea datelor ghidului venit prin aer cu cele dintr-un fiier XMLTV extern.
PVR VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways. , . , XMLTV.

Toto je doplnok PVR urenn na prepojenie s brnami softvru VBox Communications XTi TV. Podporuje vetky zkladn funkcie ako je sledovanie vysielania, nahrvanie a posun v ase. Okrem toho podporuje aj rozirovanie dajov vzduchom renho sprievodcu o extern daje XMLTV.

To je dodatek PVR za komunikacijo s TV prehodi XTi podjetja VBox Communications. Podpira vse temeljne funkcionalnosti, ki jih priakujete, kot je gledanje, snemanje in asovni zamik. Poleg tega podpira bogatenje podatkov vodnika z zunanjimi podatki XMLTV.
PVR VBox Communications' XTi . , , . , over-the-air XMLTV .

Ovo je PVR dodatni program za povezivanje VBox Communications' XTi TV Mrenim Prolazima. Podrava sve osnovne funkcionalnosti koje biste oekivali, kao to je gledanje, snimanje i vremenski pomeraj. Dodatno, podrava uveanje over-the-air podataka vodia sa spoljanjim XMLTV podacima.

Detta r ett PVR-tillgg fr kommunikation med XTi TV-gateways frn VBox Communications. Det stder all frvntad grundlggande funktionalitet, som visning, inspelning och timeshift. Det stder dessutom frbttring av signalburen guidedata via extern XMLTV-data.

To je przidwka PVR do pojsrzedniczyni ze XTi TV Gateway d VBox Communications. Podpiyr wszyjske ajnfachowe funkcyje, kerych by szo czekiwa: bziyraniy, nagrywaniy, timeshifting. krm tego, d przidwani zewnyntrznych datw XMLTV podpiyr rozszyrzowanie EPG d dostwcy.

Bu, VBox Communications' XTi TV Gateways iin arabirim salayan bir PVR eklentisidir. zleme, kaydetme ve zaman kaydrma gibi, beklenecek tm temel ilevleri destekler. Ek olarak, harici XMLTV verileri ile yayn rehberi verilerinin glendirilmesini de destekler.l

extension.summary: Inadyn: a small and simple Dynamic Domain Name System client
extension.description: Inadyn (2.1) is a small and simple Dynamic Domain Name System (DDNS) client with HTTPS support. It is commonly available in many GNU/Linux distributions, used in off-the-shelf routers and Internet gateways to automate the task of keeping your DNS record up to date with any IP address changes from your ISP. It can also be used in installations with redundant (backup) connections to the Internet.

extension.summary: tinc: a Virtual Private Network daemon
extension.description: tinc (1.1pre14) is a Virtual Private Network (VPN) daemon that uses tunnelling and encryption to create a secure private network between hosts on the Internet. Because the VPN appears to the IP level network code as a normal network device, there is no need to adapt any existing software. This allows VPN sites to share information with each other over the Internet without exposing any information to others.

extension.description: Spectrum is 'n Visualisering wat 'n roterende 3D Spektrum Analiseerder, verbeeld met , vertoon wat op die maat van die musiek beweeg en 'n golf effek oor die spektrum rooster skep. Dit het ook verstellings vir die aanpas van spektrum staaf hoogte, sy spoed, en hoe die stawe verbeeld word (solied, punte, draad raamwerk) en is 'n lekker ligte, lae cpu verbruik visualisering wat fantasties lyk

Spectrum is a Visualisation showing a rotating 3D Spectrum Analyzer rendered in that moves to the beat of the music creating a wave effect across the spectrum grid. It also has settings to adjust the spectrum bar height, Its speed, and how the bars are rendered (solid, points, wire frame) and is a nice light weight, low cpu useage visualisation that looks great
Spectrum 3D ( ). . , - solid, points, wire frame. , .

Spectrum s una visualitzaci que mostra un analitzador d'espectre giratori en 3D renderitzat amb que es mou al ritme de la msica creant un efecte d'ona al llarg de la graella de l'espectre. Tamb t opcions per ajustar l'alada de la barra de l'espectre, la seva velocitat, i com es renderitzen les barres (slid, punts, malla de filferro). Una visualitzaci que utilitza poca CPU i que s veu molt b.

Spectrum je vizualizace zobrazujc rotujc 3D spektrln analyztor rendrovan v , kter se pohybuje v rytmu hudby a vytv vlnov efekt nap spektrln mkou. Obsahuje tak nastaven pro pizpsoben vky sloupc spektra, rychlosti a zpsobu vykreslen (vyplnn, body, drtov model). Je to velmi lehk vizualizace s nzkou zat CPU, kter vypad skvle.

-spektrum er en visualisering, der viser en roterende 3D-spektrumanalysator renderet i DirectX, som bevger sig i takt til musikken og skaber en blgeeffekt p tvrs af spektrumfeltet. Den har ogs indstillinger til at justere spektrumliniens hjde, fart og hvordan den bliver renderet (fast, punkter, trdramme). Det er en letvgtsvisualisering med lavt CPU-forbrug, som ser godt ud.

Spectrum ist eine Visualisierung, die eine rotierende Spektrum Analyse in 3D zeigt. Die Visualisierung wird so gerendert, dass sie sich zum Takt der Musik bewegt und eine Welle ber das Spektrum Grid legt. Es lsst sich neben der Hhe, die Geschwindigkeit als auch die Art der Balken (durchgehend, Punkte, Drahtgeflecht) einstellen. Eine schne Visualisierung, die nur eine geringe CPU-Last erzeugt
Spectrum . , (, , ), ,

Spectrum is a Visualisation showing a rotating 3D Spectrum Analyzer rendered in that moves to the beat of the music creating a wave effect across the spectrum grid. It also has settings to adjust the spectrum bar height, Its speed, and how the bars are rendered (solid, points, wire frame) and is a nice light weight, low cpu useage visualisation that looks great

Spectrum es una visualizacin que muestra un analizador de espectro en 3D girando renderizado con que se mueve al ritmo de la msica creando un efecto de onda en la rejilla del espectro. Se puede ajustar la altura de las barras, su velocidad, y como son renderizadas (slido, puntos, malla). Es una visualizacin que utiliza poca CPU y muy agradable.

Spectrum es una visualizacin que muestra un analizador de espectro en 3D girando, renderizado con , que se mueve al ritmo de la msica creando un efecto de onda en la rejilla del espectro. Se puede ajustar la altura de las barras, su velocidad, y como son renderizadas (slido, puntos, malla). Es una visualizacin que utiliza poca CPU y muy agradable.

Espectro es una Visualizacin que muestra un Analizador de Especto en 3D rotando renderizado en que se mueve al ritmo de la msica creando un efecto de onda a travs del espectro de la red. Tambin tiene configuraciones para ajustar la altura de la barra de espectro, su velocidad, y cmo las barras son renderizadas (slidas, puntos, malla de alambre) y es una buena visualizacin liviana, de poco uso de cpu que se ve genial.

Spectrum on visuaal, mis nitab 3D spektraalanalsi renderdatud 'is, mis liigub liigub muusika rtmis luues laineefekti le spektraalvrgustiku. Lisaks on olemas ka vimalus seadistada spektri krgust, selle kiirust ja kuidas ribasid renderdatakse (tahkis, punktid, srestik). Spectrum on hea vljangemisega kerge ja vhese protsessorikasutusega visuaal.

Nytt pyrivn 3D-spektrianalysaattorin, joka liikkuu musiikin tahdissa tuottaen aaltotehosteen spektrikuvaajaan. Spektripalkin korkeuden, nopeuden, ja piirtotavan (tytetyt, pisteet, riviivat) voi asettaa asetuksista. Spectrum on kevyt visualisointi joka nytt hyvlt.

Spectrum est une visualisation affichant un analyseur de spectre 3D en rotation, sous . Il ragit au rythme de la musique, crant un effet d'onde sur la grille du spectre. Il propose divers paramtres pour ajuster la hauteur, la vitesse, et le rendu des barres du spectre (plein, points, fil de fer). Une visualisation lgre, peu gourmande en CPU et agrable regarder.

Spectrum unha Visualizacin que amosa un analizador de espectro virando en 3D renderizado con que se move ritmo da msica creando un efecto de onde longo da grella do espectro. Tamn ten opcins para axustar a altura da barra, a velocidade e como se renderizan as barras (slidas, puntos, malla) do espectro. bonito, lixeiro, de baixo custo en CPU.
Spectrum 3D Spectrum Analyzer . , , (filled, points, wire frame) .

Spectrum je vizualizacija koja prikazuje rotirajui 3D spektralni analizator renderiran u -u koji se pokree u ritmu muzike stvarajui efekt valova u spektralnoj mrei. Takoer sadri i postavke za namjetanje visine sprektralnih traka, njihove brzine, i naina na koji su prikazane (popunjeno, toke, iani okvir). Vizualizacija izgleda sjajno te je malih memorijskih i CPU zahtjeva.

Az Spectrum egy olyan vizualizci ami egy 3D hang spektrum analiztort mutat segtsgvel megjelentve, ami a zene ritmusra mozog egy hullm-effektust kpezve a teljes spektrumhln. Bellthat a spektrum oszlopok magassga, mozgsi sebessge s hogy az oszlopok hogyan jelenjenek meg (teli, pontok, drtvz). Ez egy kis erforrsigny vizualizci ami nagyon jl mutat.

Spectrum is een visualisatie met een draaiende 3D Spectrum Analyzer gerenderd in . Deze visualisatie beweegt op het ritme van de muziek en creert een golf effect over het hele spectrum. Het heeft instellingen om de barhoogte en de snelheid aan te passen, en hoe de staven worden weergegeven (vast, punten, draad frame) en is een mooie lichtgewicht visualisatie die weinig van de cpu vraagt en er geweldig uit ziet.

Spectrum uma visualizao que mostra um analisador espectral 3D rotativo, renderizado em , que se sincroniza com o ritmo da msica, criando assim um efeito de ondas na grelha espectral. De asemenea, are setri pentru ajustarea nlimii brilor spectrale, a vitezei, i a modului n care brile sunt randate (umplere, puncte, contur). Este o vizualizare cu consum redus al procesorului care arat fantastic de bine.

Spectrum je vizualizcia zobrazujca rotujci 3D spektrlny analyztor vykresovan pomocou , ktor sa hbe v rytme hudby a tak vytvra vlny naprie mriekou spektra.[CR] Zrove m nastavenia upravujce vku stpcov spektra, ich rchlos a ako s vykresovan (vyplnen, body, drtov model).
